name: h3
description: Experience the perfect blend of power and precision with the Louisville Slugger A181 Maple Wood Bat, designed for both contact and power hitters. Featuring a slightly end-loaded swing feel, this bat is crafted to enhance your hitting performance with its unique A181 turn model. The natural colorway adds a classic touch, while the flared knob and medium handle offer superior grip and control. With a drop 3 length to weight ratio and a 2 1/2 inch barrel diameter, this bat is engineered for optimal weight distribution, thanks to its cupped end, ensuring every swing is smooth and powerful. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 75 Days is included.
